entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 11 February 2023
